track.name: Every Day I Have the Blues
comments:
One of the Three Kings!
www.jackybullfrog.com
Throw in a Big Band flair..Close that door behind you..School is in session.
I CAN NOT GET ENOUGH OF B. B,
Voici Kurt. Sans casque et sans ceinture de sécurité.
What a cool spin - Big Band blues! (-:
I'm afraid I've fallen out of love with BB.  Guys like Stevie Ray Vaughan and Johnny Lang have taken over the blues.  It's just me.  Y'all can dig him all ya want.
*We* love you, Mr. King!!   the whole world loves you!  Believe that!  :D
2010 June8th '(I'm) Alabama Bound' streaming. No option in 'Suggest a correction'.
Every day I love to listen to BB King
Hm, I just heard this in last.fm radio but I'm pretty sure it was actually from Live at the Regal?
